summary: Diff adds a new multi-page marketing frontend (Home/Services/Gallery/About/Contact) with TanStack Router, a header/footer layout, page-level document titles, and a global meta description. However, the diff evidence does not demonstrate that the page structure/sections and written content specifically match precisionlasernw.com, and it introduces authentication/actor plumbing that is not required for a static marketing site.

missing_requirements.requirement: Recreate a public marketing website whose page structure, sections, and written content match the current content found on https://precisionlasernw.com, but with the company name changed everywhere to "Built Rite Creations".
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows newly written generic laser-cleaning marketing copy and a 5-page structure, but provides no evidence that all pages/sections and written content match the source site (precisionlasernw.com) or that all corresponding navigation/footer links from the source are represented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply a cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) that fits a construction/woodworking/industrial craftsmanship brand for "Built Rite Creations" and use it consistently across the entire site (avoid default-looking template styling).
missing_requirements.reason: There are two different `frontend/src/index.css` contents shown in the diff summary (one with an 'Industrial/Craft Color Palette' and typography scale, and another that appears to revert to a more default grayscale token set). This makes it unclear that a single cohesive industrial/craft theme is consistently applied across the site.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hook and authenticated/anonymous actor plumbing (React Query) included even though the request is only for a public marketing site and no backend functionality is required.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scopes to a static marketing site and says only add backend functionality if required; the diff adds Internet Identity context and actor creation hooks without any marketing-site need shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution referencing "caffeine.ai" (as described in the file summaries) which is not requested branding/content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not mentioned in the BuildRequest; footer should mirror precisionlasernw.com content with company name replaced, and extra attribution is unrequested.
